definition: Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

Khamenei, Ayatollah Aly (1939-), Supreme Leader of Iran, aka Ali Khamenei
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-

Angela Merkel (1954-), German CDU politician, chancellor from 2005
